description:
Wordpress is a content management system [CMS], and did you know that 25% of the total internet websites are powered by wordpress? and best part is it is free and open source. so you can used it and easily create your own website or blog for free. Wordpress interface is very easy to used and give you some robust controls to create your website posts, pages, navigation menus and even customize your website design look and feel without written a single line of code.

So in this course you will learn how to create your wordpress website for free no need to spend on hosting or domain. I'll show you step by step process to create your very own wordpress website for free. And then you'll learn how to create your website post, pages, how to customize and active your website theme and also check the mobile preview of your website and we also learn how to use wordpress theme customizer, learn Track Your Site Statistics then we'll learn how to configure your social media channels to automatically post your wordpress post to your social media accounts, and you also learn how to setup custom menu's to your wordpress website and optimize your website setting for SEO and even more.
title: Create Your First Wordpress Website For Free
